attributes.title: Horrible app by a racist clown
attributes.review: This is the worse app I have ever downloaded. Shame on you App Store for making such an app available. Apple how do you claim to not be racist yet make such a racist, homophobic and all around terrible app available for download?

attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: This app took 3 hours to download and once it did it shut off my phone as that happened it hacked my data and my photos were all gone and my email was hacked

attributes.title: screw this app it’s the worst
attributes.review: this took 7 hours to download and it’s super LAGGY. i’ve had the worst experience with this platform it’s is absolutely horrible, although it’s is the worst app you should probably not download this.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it was extremely slow. Then the app ask me to send them pictures of Caillou and it made my phone go all “Caillou mode.” I kept getting calls from Boris.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE 👇
attributes.review: I do not recommend this app, it’s really not good it hacked all my information.. I left it a 1 Star to be honest. It forces you to vote trump and I really don’t want to. If you are going to download it just do ya a favor and put it a 1 Star, thank you for your time

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Terrible app worst app I have ever used if I could rate it a 0 I would it’s just really bad and does not work by far the most terrible app and I have used really bad apps before but there are no words to describe how bad this app is 🤢🤮

attributes.title: Really bad
attributes.review: I down loaded this app and tried to sign up but it kept glitching and wouldn’t let me sign in and when I opened the app it would just send be back to my home page

attributes.title: Trump 2020 app
attributes.review: This app has completely disappointed me. It was nothing like i expected, uninformful, confusing to use, and took way too long to download. Wish i could give this a 0 star rating.

attributes.title: Freedom? More like dictatorship.....
attributes.review: You say we have freedom.... then don’t ban Tik tok.... it shouldn’t be up to you to decide what apps we should use or not..... and btw if u even try deleting tik tok there will be a MASSIVE crowd against you just for that so I wouldn’t do that if I were u....

attributes.title: WHPULD GIVE 0STARS IF I VOULD
attributes.review: my tortoise ate the app then it shot out of it but like a torpedo, then my tragsh teacher graded it and I got an f- awful grade really... and then I threw it away beuause it was a dumpster fire and it ACTUALLY started a fire witch I had to put out by threwing my dog intpbit... fly high gahahgabajak... ANYWAY 10/10 DO NOT RECCOMEND😭😭😥😥😭😨😨😨😨😤😤😫😫😩😩😩😤😤😤😤😤😤🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🥵😡😡😡😡😡😡😨😨😰😰😰😥😥😓😓🙄🙄🙄
